attributes.action: Rename the Bayswater road A402 to Zelenskyy street
attributes.additional_details: Because I want it to be a permanent reminder of the illegal actions taken by the Russian
attributes.background: The road outside the Russian Embassy is currently called Bayswater road, it should be renamed to Zelenskyy street in honour of the Ukrainian people and its President

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the local authority.
